messages.subject: SERIOUS FRIENDSHIPS AND BUSINESS
messages.body:
joy_windy00010@yahoo.com



Dear Sir..

The bord of directors normally send me to malaysia,china and bangkok 
to purchase ADEQUAN .The ADEQUAN  is a medicine and is 
used to treat animals,such as cattle ,horses and etc.


  The medicine is very cheap in asia compare in U.S and Europe,in u.s 
and europe, per carton of the medicine is cost 3500 to 4000pounds while in 
malaysia you will get the product for 2200usd.


  When i purchase the medicine 2200usd per carton,when i get back to my 
company i will tell my directors that i purchase the medicine for 
4000usd,i have been coming to malaysia alone all this time but right 
now,the 
directors has appointed one of the company member to go over to 
malaysia to purchase the medicine,


  Dear,this is what i want you to do,i will introduce you to a 
malaysian 
lady,she is the seller of this medicine,i want you to go and purchase 
the 
medicine from her for 2200usd so when the vertinary doctors arrive to 
malaysia i will 
introduce you to the doctors and tell them that you are the main 
supplier of the medicine and you will sell the medicine to them for 
4000usd Per carton.


  They need about 50 to 100 cartons .I want you to know that 
my percentage from the profit you will make from the transaction is 40% 
out the profit.


  i have to pass your contact details to my directors and one of them will 
be given you call,when they called you please,tell them that per carton 
of the medicine is 4000usd .please,i want you to handle the transaction 
very well please and i want to know that when you purchase the medicine 
from the LADY for 2200usd then you will sell it to the doctors for 
4000usd.


  The doctors pay cash on delivery after you supply the medicine to 
them,then they will now pay you. 
        All i needed from u is to be kind, honest, and trust,,
i hope to hear from you soon with your full contact,  phone number,   Etc


If this business proposition offends your moral and ethic values, do accept my sincere apology.  
  


  regards
JOY  WINDY
messages.raw:
JOY WINDY

joy_windy00010@yahoo.com

Date: Fri, 6 Nov 2009
From: joy_love33tt@yahoo.com
Subject: SERIOUS FRIENDSHIPS AND BUSINESS
To: joy_love33tt@yahoo.com

Dear Sir..

The bord of directors normally send me to malaysia,china and bangkok to purchase ADEQUAN .The ADEQUAN is a medicine and is used to treat animals,such as cattle ,horses and etc.

The medicine is very cheap in asia compare in U.S and Europe,in u.s and europe, per carton of the medicine is cost 3500 to 4000pounds while in malaysia you will get the product for 2200usd.

When i purchase the medicine 2200usd per carton,when i get back to my company i will tell my directors that i purchase the medicine for 4000usd,i have been coming to malaysia alone all this time but right now,the directors has appointed one of the company member to go over to malaysia to purchase the medicine,

Dear,this is what i want you to do,i will introduce you to a malaysian lady,she is the seller of this medicine,i want you to go and purchase the medicine from her for 2200usd so when the vertinary doctors arrive to malaysia i will introduce you to the doctors and tell them that you are the main supplier of the medicine and you will sell the medicine to them for 4000usd Per carton.

They need about 50 to 100 cartons .I want you to know that my percentage from the profit you will make from the transaction is 40% out the profit.

i have to pass your contact details to my directors and one of them will be given you call,when they called you please,tell them that per carton of the medicine is 4000usd .please,i want you to handle the transaction very well please and i want to know that when you purchase the medicine from the LADY for 2200usd then you will sell it to the doctors for 4000usd.

The doctors pay cash on delivery after you supply the medicine to them,then they will now pay you. All i needed from u is to be kind, honest, and trust,, i hope to hear from you soon with your full contact, phone number, Etc

If this business proposition offends your moral and ethic values, do accept my sincere apology.

regards
JOY WINDY

So "Joy Windy" (we do not make these names up) invites Arnold to join in skimming funds intended for medical treatment. Of course the funds are imaginary, but you knew that. [If you didn't, you really should go back and read the main page and everything remotely FAQy on it.]

This is basically the cow vaccine letter, not seen here in a long time (like, since before Scamorama broke down and started using style sheets).
The Honorable Stew de Baker Hawke dealt with this in a few of his fine adventures:
COW PUNCHING OF A DIFFERENT SORT and
OUAGADOUGOU THAT DOUGOU THAT YOU DOU SOU OUELL

messages.body:
Hi Joy


Sorry it done took me a while to answer youre message. Ive been in the county lockup for a couple weeks and they dont have no internets or nothin in there. 


I think I get what youre offering. So I pose like Im a businesman and tell them that stuff costs 4000 a carton? I figure I can do that. Say, that Adequn stuff, can it treat humans also? My rear is hurtin like a sumbitch after that stint in lockup and I aint got no health insurince or nothin. If you figure it would do anythin for my hemmeroids, Id sure apprecite it if youd keep a little aside for me.


Anyhow my phone numbers (502) 696 7404 and addy is


Arnold Wanker
1808 Gonad Drive
Choadtown
KY 40012



Thanks

Arnold Wanker

messages.body:
joy_windy00010@yahoo.com




Dear Arnold,
 

Thanks for your concern. I really appreciate your interest and willingness to carry out this deal with me. This is what you should do, I will email to you the contacts of the Malaysian dealer of the products. I will also pass your contacts to our company and tell them you are the supplier. thereafter, our company directors will be contacting you to buy the products from you. 


You will go to Malaysia and purchase out the product from the supplier at the rate of $2,200 per carton, and then sell to our company staff at the rate of $4,000 per carton. our company will pay cash for the products at the point of delivery there in Malaysia. We will share the profit, 60% for you and 40% for me. 


Meanwhile, according to our company director, they need 40 cartons of the product. can you afford to buy the quantity from the supplier? if no, what is your capability? like how many cartons can you afford the money to buy? let me know If you are capable and interested in handling the deal depending on what I have stated above. And I will email to you the necessary contacts.


 
Regards,
Joy
messages.raw:
JOY WINDY

joy_windy00010@yahoo.com

Joy

messages.body:
Hi Joy,

Great to hear from yall again. Id still realy apprecite hearin from you about what that there medicin can do for my hemmeroids. Im havin to sit on one of them donut cushins. Im tellin ya, there swellin up like a bunch of grapes. Sorry if thats a little to much infermation right there.

Anyhow I dont know if yall have Thanksgivin out in Malaysia, but its tommorow here in Kentucky. Problem is that I go over to my uncles place at Thanksgivin and I already done spent most of my $$ on a bigass bottle of Gentleman Jack whisky which is what my uncle likes. If you like I can tell my buddies about this here deal and see if I can raise some more cash to get some of them cartons like you said. Or if you lend me money to buy the cartons and pay my way to Malaysia Ill give you 90 percent of the profits, hows that sound? Let me know what works for yall.

Thanks

Arnold

messages.body:
Dear Arnold,

The Vaccine is used on our company products (Horses). I can not fully guarantee you if it could be used on human or not. that is left for a Veterinary doc to approve. 

I will suggest you share with your 'buddies' and see if you can raise some cash as you said. if that is possible, then we will proceed from there.

Regards,
Joy
messages.raw:
JOY WINDY
Date: Thu, 26 Nov 2009

Dear Arnold,

The Vaccine is used on our company products (Horses). I can not fully guarantee you if it could be used on human or not. that is left for a Veterinary doc to approve.

I will suggest you share with your 'buddies' and see if you can raise some cash as you said. if that is possible, then we will proceed from there.

Regards,
Joy

[Note: Here's the first place (and it's reassuringly early) where "Joy" deviates from script in demonstrating concern about Arnold's hemorrhoids. I always try to support the small-town, Mom & Pop type scams if I can.]

messages.body:
Hi Joy


Hope yall had a good Thanksgivin out there in Malaysia. We had some fun times here like allways, but theres a serius side to it also. I mean we toked up on some of cusin Travis's home grown weed and got wicked drunk on Uncle Bubbas corn whisky, but all the time we was remembrin them pillgrims that came over and gave there lives to kick them Mexicans out of the Allamo. Its stuff like that makes you proud to be American.


Thanks for the answer on the medicin. Im pretty much willin to give anythin a try right now. Can you send me over a sample of that Adeqin stuff so I can see if itll help with my butt? I promise I wont blame you or nothin if it dont work.


I talked to Travis about the deal last night. Turns out that with the money hes makin from sellin his weed, plus maybe takin out a second morgige on his doublewide, he figures he can raise about 11 grand right now. I done told him its a dead cert hes gonna get almost double his money back and hes cool with that. Dont know if thats enough to make the deal worth youre while tho.


Thanks

Arnold

messages.body:
Hi Joy


Would love to see a pic of the product, pity about the sample, but maybe with the pic I can go to a vet here and see if he can track me down some of the stuff. Sounds like its expensiv but then I dont need enough of it for a horse, just enough to take the swellin down a little. 


Sorry to hear yall are in hospital. If yall dont mind my askin, what happend? Im tellin ya, its a dangerus time of the year. My buddy Dave had to go to the ER on Friday cuz he put nitromethane in his mower to see how fast it would go but the engine done blown up on him. I done told him not to mess with that racin fuel, but too much corn whisky and you just aint gonna listen.


How much does it cost to get to Malaysia? I went to Virginia on vacation this summer and that aint to bad, but then that was cuz I got a good deal on the RV rental. I have a feelin it costs more to get to Malaysia. Is there any way your dealer over there can comp my travel? Otherwise maybe Im gonna have to hit up Travis again cuz hes the mack daddy with the big bucks right now.

Thanks

Arnold

messages.body:
Dear Arnold,
 

Please the attached file for a sample pic of the product. I will advice you dont use the vaccine for your swollen leg. I can help you ask any of the doctors here what proper medication required for your injury. wouldn't want to feel responsible if it this vaccine add to your injury instead of curing you. hope you understand my point. so I will ask the doctors here and seek their advice ok.


I don't know how much it would cost you to Malaysia from the states. You can check online on the airlines and find out the exact amount. You do not need to burg your friend anymore, you can purchase your ticket from the money he has given you already.


You told me he's willing to give you $11,000 for the business right? and $11,000 is for 5 cartons of the Vaccine. so you can buy 4 cartons first instead of 5. then make use of the remaining amount for your expenses. hope my suggestion does make sense to you.

 
When probably can you be able to fly to Malaysia for the transaction? 
 
Regards,
Joy

messages.body:
Hi Joy,


Thanks for the pic of the product. Just so were clear on it, it aint exactly my leg thats swollen. I got a bad case of hemmeroids is what it is, and theyve bin flarin up real bad ever since the last time I was in the lockup. You said the Adeqin stuff is a vaccine, does that mean that its got to be injected with a needle? Bein honest with you, I cant exactly see me lettin anyone go near that end of me with a needle right now. Im sure you understand if youd ever had a case of the hemmeroids like this one. Can you ask the docs if theres a seppositery or pill instead?


With the money and all, cusin Travis aint exactly given me the money yet, but he done told me thats how much hes able to raise. Some of it is from his weed that hes sold so thats all cash, but the rest hes gonna get from a loan on his doublewide. 


All this brings me to another idea. Hows the airport security in Malaysia? I was figurin that if I cant get all the money together and we need to hurry, I could do a part trade of some of Travises weed for a couple cartons of the vaccine. How much does a pound of weed sell for out there, ballpark?


Thanks
Arnold

With the money and all, cusin Travis aint exactly given me the money yet, but he done told me thats how much hes able to raise. Some of it is from his weed that hes sold so thats all cash, but the rest hes gonna get from a loan on his doublewide.

All this brings me to another idea. Hows the airport security in Malaysia? I was figurin that if I cant get all the money together and we need to hurry, I could do a part trade of some of Travises weed for a couple cartons of the vaccine. How much does a pound of weed sell for out there, ballpark?

Thanks,
Joy

messages.body:
Hi Joy,


Good to hear from yall again - I was startin to get worried. Its great to hear that youre surgery went well and all. By buddy Daves doin better also after what hapened with the mower and the nitromethane. They said he had second degree burns on his groin so hes been wrapped in bandages for the last few weeks so as his nads can heal up. 


Ive been on the Interweb doin some reserch on Malaysia. So Im suposed to be flyin in to Koala Lumper? Would aprecite it if you could send me the details of that supplier. I was figurin its much easier to get there flyin from New York, so Ill go ahead and take a road trip to drop in on an old school buddy that lives up there and fly out from there. Looks like I can do it as early as next week cuz the tickets go for about 2 grand anyway, and Im travelin on Travis's dollars. 



Thanks
Arnold

messages.subject: Re: Quotation
messages.body:
Dear Sir,


Thank you for your inquiry.

Date: 15/12/09

Ref.: PVIT/NZBV/8802/09v


I take pleasure to append below my price quotation and the terms and conditions of sales for your perusal and kind consideration.

Description of Product : 
Adequan 1.m Injection Rx/Equine 10ml - Adequan 1.m. is recommended for the intramuscular treatment of non-infectious degenerative and/or traumatic joint dysfunction and associated lameness of the carpal and hock joints in horses..

Ingredents :
Each vail contains 500mg PSGAG in water for injection, Polysulfacted, Glycosa minoglysan (PSGAG) solution.

Instructions :
Dossage and administration, the recommended close Adequan in horse is 500mg (1vial) once a week for five week. do not mix adequan with other vaccine or solvents. Single dose vial discard unused portion. store at controlled room temperature 18-25 degrees C (64-77 degree F)

Side Effect :
Side effect that occur including transistent pain at the side of the injection, transistent diarrhea, and abnormal bleeding.

Price:
USD $2,200.  per carton. 
($1 Dollar =  3.4 Ringgit Malaysia)

Price quoted is ex-stock Kuala Lumpur (FOB) in United States Dollars. Availability of stock is subject to goods remaining unsold.
Promotion Discount of $15 from each carton if you are purchasing 20 cartons above.


Packing/Quantity:
Goods are packed in 10 vials per carton
1 vial is 10ml

Mode Of Payment
Cash On delivery (C.O.D)



STOCK AVAILABLE


 Up to 100packs in Stock available and ready for supply.

messages.raw:
Jamilah Intan Abdulah
Date: Tue, 15 Dec 2009
Subject: Re: Quotation

Dear Sir,

Thank you for your inquiry.

Date: 15/12/09

Ref.: PVIT/NZBV/8802/09v
I take pleasure to append below my price quotation and the terms and conditions of sales for your perusal and kind consideration.

Description of Product :
Adequan 1.m Injection Rx/Equine 10ml - Adequan 1.m. is recommended for the intramuscular treatment of non-infectious degenerative and/or traumatic joint dysfunction and associated lameness of the carpal and hock joints in horses..

Ingredents : Each vail contains 500mg PSGAG in water for injection, Polysulfacted, Glycosa minoglysan (PSGAG) solution. Instructions :
Dossage and administration, the recommended close Adequan in horse is 500mg (1vial) once a week for five week. do not mix adequan with other vaccine or solvents. Single dose vial discard unused portion. store at controlled room temperature 18-25 degrees C (64-77 degree F)

Side Effect :
Side effect that occur including transistent pain at the side of the injection, transistent diarrhea, and abnormal bleeding.

Price:
USD $2,200. per carton.
($1 Dollar = 3.4 Ringgit Malaysia)

Price quoted is ex-stock Kuala Lumpur (FOB) in United States Dollars.
Availability of stock is subject to goods remaining unsold.
Promotion Discount of $15 from each carton if you are purchasing 20 cartons above.

Packing/Quantity:
Goods are packed in 10 vials per carton
1 vial is 10ml

Mode Of Payment
Cash On delivery (C.O.D)

STOCK AVAILABLE
Up to 100packs in Stock available and ready for supply.

Assuring you of our prompt attention and services at all times.

Regards,

Jamilah Intan Abdulah
No 2 Jalan Bandaran, 88675
Kota Kinabalu Sabah, Malaysia.
+6012 9801 640
Email:jamilah_distribution@yahoo.com

[Note: This is where it gets interesting. "Jamilah" has an IP in Singapore, as opposed to "Joy" and "Brian Johnsons" (who we'll meet later) that are using the same Malaysian IP. It leads me to believe there are actually two separate people running this scam. Hmm.]

messages.subject: Urgent Reply
messages.body:
Valleyvetvgroup@mail2Farmer.com


Atten: Mr. Arnold Wanker,


We the staffs of Valley Vet Veterinary Group are hereby extending our greetings to you and appreciating your contribution towards the supplying of Adequan to our company through  who is our supplier.


Ms. Windy who was in charge of supplying Adequan 1.m Injection R/X Equine (Horse Treatment Vaccine) to our company, due to her conditions she cannot be able to travel to Malaysia to purchase the product and supply to our company, therefore our Chief Executive Manager have appointed me Brian Bruce Jonhsons to travel to Malaysia and purchase the products. We asked Ms. Windy to give us your contacts to enable us place an order for the product because we cannot wait until she recover, because we are running out of stock in our farm and we need the product urgently.


So, I hereby place an order of 40cartons of Adequan 1.m Injection Rx/Equine. Our last purchase which Ms. Windy supplied to us before she met with a car accident was $4,000.00 (Four Thousand United States American dollars per carton) hope the price still remains the same. As soon as I receive your confirmation about the order, I will send to you the Purchasing Order. Thank you for your anticipated co-operation.


Regards,
Brian Bruce Johnsons
Procurement Manager.
+447031824948


Valley Veterinary Group
Pangbourne Veterinary
Horseshoe Road
Pangbourne
Reading
RG8 7JQ
messages.raw:
Brian Bruce Johnsons

Valleyvetvgroup@mail2Farmer.com

Subject: Urgent Reply
Date: Mon, 21 Dec 2009

Atten: Mr. Arnold Wanker,

We the staffs of Valley Vet Veterinary Group are hereby extending our greetings to you and appreciating your contribution towards the supplying of Adequan to our company through Miss. Joy Windy who is our supplier.

Ms. Windy who was in charge of supplying Adequan 1.m Injection R/X Equine (Horse Treatment Vaccine) to our company, due to her conditions she cannot be able to travel to Malaysia to purchase the product and supply to our company, therefore our Chief Executive Manager have appointed me Brian Bruce Jonhsons to travel to Malaysia and purchase the products. We asked Ms. Windy to give us your contacts to enable us place an order for the product because we cannot wait until she recover, because we are running out of stock in our farm and we need the product urgently.

So, I hereby place an order of 40cartons of Adequan 1.m Injection Rx/Equine. Our last purchase which Ms. Windy supplied to us before she met with a car accident was $4,000.00 (Four Thousand United States American dollars per carton) hope the price still remains the same. As soon as I receive your confirmation about the order, I will send to you the Purchasing Order. Thank you for your anticipated co-operation.

Regards,
Brian Bruce Johnsons
Procurement Manager.
+447031824948

Valley Veterinary Group
Pangbourne Veterinary
Horseshoe Road
Pangbourne
Reading
RG8 7JQ

Scam-o-Note: The real Valley Veterinary Group have nothing to do with any of this, and probably don't even know about it.

So, to recap, "Joy" has asked Arnold to buy what he thinks will be Adequan from "Jamila" at $2200/carton, but to tell the poor innocent (imaginary) Vet "Brian" that it cost $4000.

"Joy" starts things off. "Jamila" is the closer. "Brian" may be "Joy" using a different e-mail account. "Jamila" may or may not be a woman; is probably not Malaysian.

They hope Arnold will go along with this dishonest (if imaginary) scheme and fork out real money for nothing - because there is no Adequan, no Jamila, no Joy, got it? Even if there is a Brian at the (real) Vet practice, the scammers have simply copied the details of the firm off their web site, is that clear? Don't make us come over there.

The flight got in a bit early so I hung out in the arrival hall for a while but didnt see anyone so I left to hit up the airport bar. Came back later on but still didnt see my name or anything. Im typin this from the internets kiosk at the airport, and Im lookin to get a room at a hotel called Pan Paciffic, it looks pretty nice and its right here in the airport. Trouble with tryin to call me is that my cell aint workin out here, I think it needs to be one of them try bands or somethin and it aint. You should be able to get me at the hotel though.

Thanks
Arnold

messages.body:
Dear Arnold,
 
I'm honestly worried and restless here. I was waiting the whole day yesterday to get updates from you, but nothing was heard from you.  is already there in Malaysia. He called me as soon as he arrived there this morning and told me he has no way of contacting you because he doesn't have your contact number. I did told you to get yourself a mobile number as soon as you arrive there. 
 
Have you been able to meet  or her assistant by now? you need to in case you haven't. why dont you contact  via phone and then inform her where you are so she could fetch you. dont get yourself stressed out by drinking too much. just focus and do what you are there for. I expect to get a good news from you.
 
Regards,
Joy
messages.raw:
JOY WINDY
Date: Sun, 27 Dec 2009

Dear Arnold,

I'm honestly worried and restless here. I was waiting the whole day yesterday to get updates from you, but nothing was heard from you. Brian is already there in Malaysia. He called me as soon as he arrived there this morning and told me he has no way of contacting you because he doesn't have your contact number. I did told you to get yourself a mobile number as soon as you arrive there.

Have you been able to meet Jamilah or her assistant by now? you need to in case you haven't. why dont you contact Jamilah via phone and then inform her where you are so she could fetch you. dont get yourself stressed out by drinking too much. just focus and do what you are there for. I expect to get a good news from you.

Regards,
Joy

[Note: I can't ever remember having become stressed out by drinking too much. Passed out and/or carried out, perhaps.]

messages.body:
Joy,

OK so I finally made it back into the US. I thought I was gonna be spendin some time in a Malaysian jail instead. I never did hear nothin from , but Im figurin it coulda been her or that dude  from the vet company that turned me in to the cops. So I got picked up by security at the airport when I was fixin to get my flight back. They searched all my clothes and bags, and even went prospectin with the glove, if you know what Im sayin. They didnt find nothin, cuz Id smoked it all by then anyway, but someone must of tipped them. Anyhow, then the cops got askin what I was doin in Malaysia, so I told them all about you, , and that dude . They looked through all my emails and wrote a bunch of stuff down, and the whole time they was laughin at me and tellin me that yall were goin to rip me off. Now I aint stupid and I told them I was just helpin yall out with a bisiness deal, but they werent havin none of it. Dont take no offense now but I tell you, yall got some strange people out there in Malaysia. Next time yall are goin to have to find someone else to help you out, cuz I surely aint goin back there again in a hurry.

Arnold
messages.raw:
Arnold Wanker

Date: Tue, December 29, 2009

Joy,

I never did hear nothin from Jamillah, but Im figurin it coulda been her or that dude Bruce from the vet company that turned me in to the cops. So I got picked up by security at the airport when I was fixin to get my flight back. They searched all my clothes and bags, and even went prospectin with the glove, if you know what Im sayin. They didnt find nothin, cuz Id smoked it all by then anyway, but someone must of tipped them. Anyhow, then the cops got askin what I was doin in Malaysia, so I told them all about you, Jamillah, and that dude Bruce. They looked through all my emails and wrote a bunch of stuff down, and the whole time they was laughin at me and tellin me that yall were goin to rip me off. Now I aint stupid and I told them I was just helpin yall out with a bisiness deal, but they werent havin none of it. Dont take no offense now but I tell you, yall got some strange people out there in Malaysia. Next time yall are goin to have to find someone else to help you out, cuz I surely aint goin back there again in a hurry.

Arnold

messages.body:
Hi Arnold,
 
I have read all your stories and it's not funny to me. I have contacted  and she told me all her stories. "her assistant waited for you at the airport and couldn't see you. they later sent you an email and give you her assistant's number for delivery of the products, but you never called up".  also narrated his own story, "he waited there and also emailed you his number in Malaysia so you could call him, but you also didnt call him". 
 
before you went to Malaysia, I told you to get a number once you arrive there and send to me for easy communication, but you never did. so who is to blame? no body was able to contact you because you didn't provide any number, even the hotel where you lodged in, has a number, but you could give a number to reach you. anyways, to be honest with you, I fell a whole disappointed with all these. now I'm facing the consequences with our company.
 
Take care,
Joy
messages.raw:
JOY WINDY
Date: Tue, 29 Dec 2009

Hi Arnold,

I have read all your stories and it's not funny to me. I have contacted Jamilah and she told me all her stories. "her assistant waited for you at the airport and couldn't see you. they later sent you an email and give you her assistant's number for delivery of the products, but you never called up". Brian also narrated his own story, "he waited there and also emailed you his number in Malaysia so you could call him, but you also didnt call him".

before you went to Malaysia, I told you to get a number once you arrive there and send to me for easy communication, but you never did. so who is to blame? no body was able to contact you because you didn't provide any number, even the hotel where you lodged in, has a number, but you could give a number to reach you. anyways, to be honest with you, I fell a whole disappointed with all these. now I'm facing the consequences with our company.

Take care,
Joy

[Note: And this was an unexpected bonus. I didn't expect to hear anything back at this point.]

messages.body:
Hi Joy

Well, I aim to amuse, but I guess I missed the mark this time if yall are tellin me it aint funny. 

Just curious, but how was this deal goin to go down anyway if Id called them like they said? Was "" goin to sell me 4 bottles of water with a picture of a horse on the front for $8800, then "" never shows up? Or did you plan to do it the old fashion way where some of your goons just turn up, beat the crap outta me, and take the cash? Like I said, Im just wonderin. 

Please let me know.

Thanks
Arnold













scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
